text: Awuzanga umbone na lowo waphikisana noIbrâhîm ngeNkosi yakhe (uAllâh) kuba uAllâh Wayemphe ubukumkani? Wathi (uIbrâhîm) esakuthi (kuye) “INkosi yam (uAllâh) nguYe Onika ubomi, Anike nokufa”. Wathi yena “Ndim onika ubomi ndenze nokufa”. UIbrâhîm wathi, “Inene! UAllâh Wenze ilanga laphuma empuma, khawulenze ke wena liphume entshona”. Waba ngaloo ndlela uyoyisakala lowo ungakholwayo. UAllâh Akabakhokeli abagabadeli
